column4: iirc it is something to do with xauth, you might need to install an xauth proxy or something.
hmm, don't remember doing that on this box, but it works fine... I'll look into it
I know this is old, but I'm sure I had to do it on my 10.04LTS VMs - http://www.miscdebris.net/blog/2007/05/24/x11-forwarding-with-openssh-on-bare-ubuntu-server-edition/
Aha, installing xorg-xauth made it work fine, thanks :D
